sentences.en: The totalitarian State reverses the former relationship between the State and the Banks.
sentences.cn: 全能国家彻底颠覆了国家和银行先前的关系。

sentences.en: The totalitarian State will not have an empty treasury so long as private companies or individuals still have ample cash or liquid assets.
sentences.cn: 只要私人企业和个人还有充足的现金或流动资产，那么全能国家的财政就不会枯竭。

sentences.en: Other words used in variable meanings, in most cases more or less dishonestly, are: class, totalitarian, science, progressive, reactionary, bourgeois, equality.
sentences.cn: 其它的以各种意义使用的、绝大多数情况下或多或少不诚实使用的词有：class, totalitarian, science, progressive, reactionary, bourgeois, equality。
